Package server.universe

The server.universe package contains everything about the virtual world, but not things relating to other parts of the server.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BehaviorStrategy A BehaviorStrategy represents a behavior that a MOB can have at any given time.
Entity Entity represents something in the Universe.
 

Class Summary
Creature The Creature interface represents any living or life-like agent in the universe.
DefaultUniverse A simple default universe that can be loaded for a demo, or when the universe file isn't there.
Exit An Exit is a way to get from one Room to another.
Player The Player class represents a player's character.
RandomRoomFactory This class is a builder that uses an abstract factory.
Room A Room represents a location in the universe.
Universe A Universe represents the entire state of the virtual world.
 

Enum Summary
Direction A Direction is some possible direction that an exit can be pointing.
RoomType A RoomType is a particular type of room that shares common characteristics with other rooms of the same type.
Skill This is an enum of possible skills.
 

Package server.universe Description

The server.universe package contains everything about the virtual world, but not things relating to other parts of the server.
